name: Badminton
description: Since I was young, badminton has been my favorute sport due to its rapid and precise nature.

name: Hitting the Gym
description: I love going to the gym, it always makes me feel like I've achieved something when I go

name: Listening to Music
description: I love listening to new music. I spend lots of time reading lyrics and learning about my favorite artists

name: Playing Games
description: Playing video games is one of my favorite pastimes. My favorite games are Super Mario Galaxy, and Animal Crossing

name: Coding
description: I have loved writing computer programs since I was little. I spend lots of my time writing little games that I can play with family and friends

name: Running
description: I adore running, it allows me to challenge myself by seeing how far I can go, how fast I am or long I can go for.
